data.name: Doctor Voodoo
data.description: Doctor Voodoo is a powerful sorcerer who uses his soul manipulation abilities to restore and protect his allies while turning his enemies against each other.

starItems.name: Doctor Voodoo
starItems.description: Doctor Voodoo is a powerful sorcerer who uses his soul manipulation abilities to restore and protect his allies while turning his enemies against each other.

3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target to self

6.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target to self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

7.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target to self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>8%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target.

Mind Control <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies to attack the primary target. The controlled enemies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health + Barrier adjacent non-<color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be  blocked.

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target.

Mind Control <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies to attack the primary target. The controlled enemies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health + Barrier adjacent non-<color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be  blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target.

Mind Control <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies to attack the primary target. The controlled enemies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + Barrier adjacent non-<color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be  blocked.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target.

Mind Control <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies to attack the primary target. The controlled enemies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + Barrier adjacent non-<color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be  blocked.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target.

Mind Control <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies to attack the primary target. The controlled enemies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health + Barrier adjacent non-<color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be  blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for controlled characters
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to adjacent targets

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary and adjacent targets.

Mind Control <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies to attack the primary target. The controlled enemies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health + Barrier adjacent non-<color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be  blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target + Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to adjacent targets.

Mind Control <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies to attack the primary target. The controlled enemies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + Barrier adjacent non-<color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this attack cannot be  blocked.

1.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health stolen to all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

2.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health stolen to all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

3.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>75%</color> Health stolen to all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
Redistribute +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Health
In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies

4.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>100%</color> Health stolen to all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
Redistribute +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Health
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies

5.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>125%</color> Health stolen to all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
Redistribute +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Health
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies

6.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>150%</color> Health stolen to all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
Steal +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Health
Clear all negative effects from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies

7.description:
Steal <color=#86e619>20%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute <color=#86e619>150%</color> Health stolen to all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Clear all negative effects from all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for each <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on this character, up to a max of +<color=#86e619>25%</color>.
When any ally dies, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

While <color=#86e619>5</color> enemies have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, self and all allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance and Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
> On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for each <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on this character, up to a max of +<color=#86e619>25%</color>.
When any ally dies, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

While <color=#86e619>5</color> enemies have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, self and all allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
> On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for each <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on this character, up to a max of +<color=#86e619>25%</color>.
When any ally dies, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

While <color=#86e619>5</color> enemies have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, self and all allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance and Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
> On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage
When any ally dies, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for each <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on this character, up to a max of +<color=#86e619>25%</color>.
When any ally dies, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

While <color=#86e619>5</color> enemies have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, self and all allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
> On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed for each <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on this character, up to a max of +<color=#86e619>25%</color>.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
When any ally dies, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies.

While <color=#86e619>5</color> enemies have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, self and all allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Chance and Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
> On Spawn, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies or self that were not at full energy.
